requirement_text: The system shall support safe deployment of the UUV from a surface vessel under operational marine conditions
The system shall support safe deployment of the UUV from a surface vessel under operational marine conditions
The system shall support safe deployment of the UUV from a surface vessel under operational marine conditions
The UUV shall autonomously transition from launch to mission mode when in water
The UUV shall autonomously transition from launch to mission mode when in water
The UUV shall autonomously transition from launch to mission mode when in water
The UUV shall obtain an initial navigation fix before submergence
The UUV shall obtain an initial navigation fix before submergence
The UUV shall obtain an initial navigation fix before submergence
Pre-dive diagnostic checks between vessel and UUV shall be performed and confirmed before launch proceeds
Pre-dive diagnostic checks between vessel and UUV shall be performed and confirmed before launch proceeds
Pre-dive diagnostic checks between vessel and UUV shall be performed and confirmed before launch proceeds
The interface shall display GO/NO-GO status for environmental/operational launch criteria
The interface shall display GO/NO-GO status for environmental/operational launch criteria
The interface shall display GO/NO-GO status for environmental/operational launch criteria
The system shall restrict launch locations based on navigational hazards, EEZ, and restricted zones
The system shall restrict launch locations based on navigational hazards, EEZ, and restricted zones
The system shall restrict launch locations based on navigational hazards, EEZ, and restricted zones
Launch procedures shall account for site-specific current, tide, and traffic conditions
Launch procedures shall account for site-specific current, tide, and traffic conditions
Launch procedures shall account for site-specific current, tide, and traffic conditions
The system shall provide maximum allowable wind, swell, and wave condition settings for safe launch
The system shall provide maximum allowable wind, swell, and wave condition settings for safe launch
The system shall provide maximum allowable wind, swell, and wave condition settings for safe launch
Buoyancy and environmental parameters near launch (including salinity and temperature) shall be monitored
Buoyancy and environmental parameters near launch (including salinity and temperature) shall be monitored
Buoyancy and environmental parameters near launch (including salinity and temperature) shall be monitored
Day/night or light-level operational requirements shall be user configurable
Day/night or light-level operational requirements shall be user configurable
Day/night or light-level operational requirements shall be user configurable
Launch location selection tools shall factor proximity to subsea objectives and launch vessel maneuverability
Launch location selection tools shall factor proximity to subsea objectives and launch vessel maneuverability
Launch location selection tools shall factor proximity to subsea objectives and launch vessel maneuverability
The UUV shall maintain stable communications with the vessel during pre-launch and immersion
The UUV shall maintain stable communications with the vessel during pre-launch and immersion
The UUV shall maintain stable communications with the vessel during pre-launch and immersion
The UUV shall accelerate efficiently on the surface and initiate a safe, optimal dive profile
The UUV shall accelerate efficiently on the surface and initiate a safe, optimal dive profile
The UUV shall accelerate efficiently on the surface and initiate a safe, optimal dive profile
Mission control shall allow configuration of dive angle, duration, and depth
Mission control shall allow configuration of dive angle, duration, and depth

The UUV shall adjust power and speed to maintain dive efficiency and safety
The UUV shall adjust power and speed to maintain dive efficiency and safety
The UUV shall adjust power and speed to maintain dive efficiency and safety
Navigation module shall incorporate real-time oceanographic data for dive planning
Navigation module shall incorporate real-time oceanographic data for dive planning

The UUV shall be able to offset its dive for avoidance of hazards and remain in approved waters
The UUV shall be able to offset its dive for avoidance of hazards and remain in approved waters

The system shall respect GO/NO-GO constraints for protected infrastructure and environmental zones
The system shall respect GO/NO-GO constraints for protected infrastructure and environmental zones
The system shall respect GO/NO-GO constraints for protected infrastructure and environmental zones
Guidance control shall enforce safe minimum/maximum dive or climb angles
Guidance control shall enforce safe minimum/maximum dive or climb angles
Guidance control shall enforce safe minimum/maximum dive or climb angles
The UUV shall support selectable dive behaviors (straight/spiral/waypoint)
The UUV shall support selectable dive behaviors (straight/spiral/waypoint)
The UUV shall support selectable dive behaviors (straight/spiral/waypoint)
Navigation system must support dead reckoning, USBL, and LBL with selectable modes
Navigation system must support dead reckoning, USBL, and LBL with selectable modes

The UUV shall automatically activate collision avoidance when nearing the seafloor
The UUV shall automatically activate collision avoidance when nearing the seafloor
The UUV shall automatically activate collision avoidance when nearing the seafloor
The vessel operator may interrupt or abort dive profiles from the surface
The vessel operator may interrupt or abort dive profiles from the surface

The system shall maintain a functional vessel-UUV link for initial dive phase health/status updates

The UUV shall autonomously adapt path and depth based on real-time environmental data

The system shall optimize route and speed to balance battery reserves and payload needs
The system shall optimize route and speed to balance battery reserves and payload needs
The system shall optimize route and speed to balance battery reserves and payload needs
Mission planner shall enable waypoint, depth, and altitude management for sensor optimization
Mission planner shall enable waypoint, depth, and altitude management for sensor optimization

The UUV shall log and transmit navigation, status, and payload data at configured intervals
The UUV shall log and transmit navigation, status, and payload data at configured intervals
The UUV shall log and transmit navigation, status, and payload data at configured intervals
The navigation engine shall account for currents, stratification, and up/down-welling

The UUV shall maintain avoidance of seafloor and subsea hazards using internal mapping

Autonomous fail-safes shall respond to loss of comms, excessive attitude, or collision warnings

Mission completion criteria (waypoint/objective achieved) shall trigger return or next-phase behavior
Mission completion criteria (waypoint/objective achieved) shall trigger return or next-phase behavior

The operator may configure the level of required autonomy or surface oversight per mission

Continuous or burst-based UUV-vessel telemetry protocols shall be supported
Continuous or burst-based UUV-vessel telemetry protocols shall be supported
